titleStmt.title: Britains triumph, for her imparallel'd deliverance, and her joyfull celebrating the proclamation of her most gracious, incomparable King Charles the Second, &c. defender of the faith. Being a happy fore-runner of the day of his nativity, and as is hoped of his coronation.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Palmer at the Palm-treee [sic], neer St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Palm-treee [sic], neer St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street
